ARABIC: فَلَمَّا تَرَٰٓءَا ٱلْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And when the two hosts came into sight of one another Musa's companions said, 'We will surely be overtaken!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: When the two forces drew within seeing distance of each other, the people of Moses said: "We shall certainly be overtaken."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and when the groups came face to face, the companions of Moses cried out: "We are overtaken!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people of the Pharaoh pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when the two groups saw each other, those with Moosa said, “They have caught us.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when the two hosts saw each other, the companions of Musa said: "We are sure to be overtaken."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when the two hosts saw each other, the companions of Musa cried out: Most surely we are being overtaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and, when the two hosts sighted each other, the companions of Moses said, 'We are overtaken!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when the two hosts saw each other, those with Moses said: Lo! we are indeed caught.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and when the two groups saw each other, Moses' companions said, "We are sure to be overtaken."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when the two parties saw each other, the companions of Musa said: verily we are overtaken.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When the two hosts sighted each other, the companions of Moses said, ‘Indeed we have been caught up.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And when the two bodies saw each other, the people of Moses said: "We are sure to be overtaken."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when the two hosts saw each other, the companions of Musa (Moses) said: "We are sure to be overtaken."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And when the two hosts came in view of each other, Moses' companions said: 'We have been reached'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When the two groups sighted each other, the followers of Moses said, “We are being overtaken.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when the two companies saw one another, the companions of Moses said, "Indeed, we are to be overtaken!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:61] And when the two hosts sighted each other, the companions of Moses said, ‘We have been caught!’, Pharaoh’s hosts have caught us up and we have no power against them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when the two hosts) the group of Moses and that of Pharaoh (saw each other, those with Moses said: Lo! we are indeed caught) Moses, they have caught up with us.
